name: allegro-poszukiwacz
author: Piotr Kochan
description: Browser extension for Allegro.pl for quick jump to not-promoted offers

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run chrome-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run opera-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run firefox-build
scripts.chrome-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=chrome gulp dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=chrome gulp zip
scripts.opera-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=opera gulp dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=opera gulp zip
scripts.firefox-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=firefox gulp dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production TARGET=firefox gulp zip
scripts.dist: npm run chrome-dist && npm run opera-dist && npm run firefox-dist
